thread.title: Top Reasons To Watch Vikram's 10 Enradhukulla And Vijay Sethupathi's Naanum Rowdydhaan!
thread.title_full: Top Reasons To Watch Vikram's 10 Enradhukulla And Vijay Sethupathi's Naanum Rowdydhaan!

title: Top Reasons To Watch Vikram's 10 Enradhukulla And Vijay Sethupathi's Naanum Rowdydhaan!
text:
Written by: Avinash Gopinath Published: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 17:13 [IST] 
As reported earlier, two prominent films will release tomorrow (October 21st). Vijay Sethupathi 's Naanum Rowdydhaan and Vikram 's 10 Enradhukulla will take on each other in the 5 long day weekend and beyond, starting tomorrow. Naanum Rowdy Dhaan (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
Though a tough competition at the box office is expected between these two movies, the fact that they are releasing during the festive season should eventually help both these flicks gain a fair share of money by the end of their first weekend. 
But before we delve into the box office collections, let's take a look at the possible reasons why someone would be interested to catch both Naanum Rowdydhaan and 10 Enradhukulla on the big screen. 
To begin with, both these films promise to display something new that has never been experienced before by Tamil audiences. For instance, 10 Enradhukulla might have some exhilarating stunt sequences involving supercars. 
Though Tamil films have showcased such stunts in the past, involvement of Hollywood stuntman Lee Whitaker and valuable inputs from professional F1 racer Narain Karthikeyan might've elevated the quality of car stunts shown in 10 Enradhukulla . 
When it comes to Naanum Rowdydhaan, Nayantara will be seen playing a deaf girl for the first time. That's the kind of role that promises to feed the actress' acting capabilities and might also end up as a treat to all her fans. 
Check out the slides below for top reasons to watch 10 Enradhukulla and Naanum Rowdy Dhaan : Reasons To Watch 10 Enradhukulla 1/7 Good Star Cast 
Apart from the lead pair, this movie will exhibit a host of exciting performers like Pasupathy, Rahul Dev, Jackie Shroff, Abhimanyu Singh and Manobala among others. Actress Charmy Kaur will be seen playing a cameo role. Reasons To Watch 10 Enradhukulla 2/7 A Fresh Pair 
This is the first time Vikram and Samantha will be seen together in a movie. The duo looked adorable in the trailer and the film will certainly have more of them and their on-screen chemistry. Reasons To Watch 10 Enradhukulla 3/7 Different Genres? 
Though 10 Enradhukulla is largely an action oriented film, Vikram did mention in an interview that this movie is actually a romantic flick cloaked under some heavy-duty action sequences. A romantic road film with good stunts might end up being an enjoyable watch. Reasons To Watch Naanum Rowdydhaan 4/7 Strong Technical Crew 
You know the film is blessed with strong technical crew when it is associated with names like George C Williams (cinematographer), Sreekar Prasad (editor) and Anirudh Ravichander (music director). Reasons To Watch Naanum Rowdydhaan 5/7 New And Talented Pair 
Like 10 Enradhukulla , Naanum Rowdydhaan will also have a never seen before lead pair. Given Vijay Sethupathi and Nayantara's acting prowesses, it should be a treat to watch them together on the silver screen. Reasons To Watch Naanum Rowdydhaan 6/7 Exciting Star Cast 
Naanum Rowdydhaan has one of the most exciting star cast in recent times. Parthiepan plays the movie's main antagonist and Radhika will be seen in the role of a cop. Actors like Anandaraj, Rajendran and RJ Balaji might take care of the film's comedy elements. The film will also feature Vijay Sethupathi's son Surya making his debut. You might like
